attributes.action: hold a referendum with in England to determine the need for an English parliament
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With Scotland having it's own parliament with a Nationalist First Minister, a Welsh Assembly with a Nationalist First Minister, the re-establishment of Storment. England suffers positive discrimination, and the English an abuse of their human rights. Three other countries having a say in English affairs, with no reciprecol arrangement.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
